languages.text: "Большую услугу взамен на большую услугу. Отыщите на Кетца Темере Лорд-капитана Винтерскейла и верните его на "Обет Императора". Клянусь Золотым Троном, что смогу убедить его встать на вашу сторону в любом конфликте в ближайшую сотню лет. В конце концов, пока Лорд-капитан отсутствует, мне дозволено заключать любые сделки от его имени".

traits.locale_text: "Большую услугу взамен на большую услугу. Отыщите на Кетца-аль Хете Лорд-капитана Винтерскейла и верниете его на "Обет Императора". Клянусь Золотым Троном, что смогу убедить его встать на вашу сторону в любом конфликте в ближайшую сотню лет. В конце концов, пока Лорд-капитан отсутствует, мне дозволено заключать любые сделки от его имени".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "A generous favour in return for a generous favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Emperor's Vow. I swear by the Golden Throne that I will convince him to side with you in any conflict that occurs in the next hundred years. After all, I am allowed to make deals on the Lord Captain's behalf while he remains unavailable."
languages.original_text: "Большую услугу взамен на большую услугу. Отыщите на Кетца Темере Лорд-капитана Винтерскейла и верните его на "Обет Императора". Клянусь Золотым Троном, что смогу убедить его встать на вашу сторону в любом конфликте в ближайшую сотню лет. В конце концов, пока Лорд-капитан отсутствует, мне дозволено заключать любые сделки от его имени".

traits.locale_text: "A great favour in return for a great favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Oath of the Emperor. I swear by the Golden Throne that I will convince him to side with you in any conflict in the next hundred years. After all, I am allowed to make any deals on the Lord Captain's behalf as long as he remains unavailable."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "A great favour in return for a great favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Oath of the Emperor. After all, I am allowed to make any deals on the Lord Captain's behalf as long as he remains unavailable."

traits.locale_text: "A generous favour in return for a generous favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Emperor's Vow. I swear by the Golden Throne that I will convince him to side with you in any conflict that occurs in the next hundred years. After all, I am allowed to make deals on the Lord Captain's behalf while he remains unavailable."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Une faveur généreuse, qui sera généreusement récompensée. Retrouvez le seigneur-capitaine Winterscale sur Quetza Temer et ramenez-le à bord du Serment de l'Empereur. Si vous y parvenez, je jure sur le Trône d'Or de le convaincre de vous assister dans tous les conflits auxquels vous prendrez part au cours des cent prochaines années. Après tout, je suis autorisé à conclure des accords au nom du seigneur-capitaine en son absence. »
languages.original_text: "A generous favour in return for a generous favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Emperor's Vow. I swear by the Golden Throne that I will convince him to side with you in any conflict that occurs in the next hundred years. After all, I am allowed to make deals on the Lord Captain's behalf while he remains unavailable."

traits.locale_text: « Une faveur généreuse, qui sera généreusement récompensée. Retrouvez le seigneur-capitaine Winterscale sur Quetza Temer et ramenez-le à bord du Serment de l'Empereur. Si vous y parvenez, je jure sur le Trône d'Or de le convaincre de vous assister dans tous les conflits auxquels vous prendrez part au cours des cent prochaines années. Après tout, je suis autorisé à conclure des accords au nom du seigneur-capitaine en son absence. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “一项慷慨的恩惠，换取另一项慷慨的恩惠。如果您可以前往格扎尔特默，找到温特斯凯尔舰长大人，把他带回帝皇誓约号，那我愿意以黄金王座起誓，无论将来的一百年里发生什么样的冲突，我都会说服他站在您这边。毕竟，此刻舰长大人不在，我可以以他的名义达成协议。”
languages.original_text: "A generous favour in return for a generous favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Emperor's Vow. I swear by the Golden Throne that I will convince him to side with you in any conflict that occurs in the next hundred years. After all, I am allowed to make deals on the Lord Captain's behalf while he remains unavailable."

traits.locale_text: “一项慷慨的恩惠，换取另一项慷慨的恩惠。如果您可以前往格扎尔特默，找到温特斯凯尔舰长大人，把他带回帝皇誓约号，那我愿意以黄金王座起誓，无论将来的一百年里发生什么样的冲突，我都会说服他站在您这边。毕竟，此刻舰长大人不在，我可以以他的名义达成协议。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Ein großzügiger Gefallen im Tausch gegen einen großzügigen Gefallen. Findet Lord Captain Winterzunder auf Quetza Temer und bringt ihn zurück auf die Eid des Imperators. Ich schwöre beim Goldenen Thron, ihn überzeuge ihn, sich in den nächsten einhundert Jahren in jedem Konflikt auf Eure Seite zu schlagen. Ich bin schließlich autorisiert, in Abwesenheit des Lord Captains seine Geschäfte für ihn zu führen."
languages.original_text: "A generous favour in return for a generous favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Emperor's Vow. I swear by the Golden Throne that I will convince him to side with you in any conflict that occurs in the next hundred years. After all, I am allowed to make deals on the Lord Captain's behalf while he remains unavailable."

traits.locale_text: "Ein großzügiger Gefallen im Tausch gegen einen großzügigen Gefallen. Findet Lord Captain Winterzunder auf Quetza Temer und bringt ihn zurück auf die Eid des Imperators. Ich schwöre beim Goldenen Thron, ihn überzeuge ihn, sich in den nächsten einhundert Jahren in jedem Konflikt auf Eure Seite zu schlagen. Ich bin schließlich autorisiert, in Abwesenheit des Lord Captains seine Geschäfte für ihn zu führen."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Un generoso favor a cambio de otro. Encuentre al Lord Capitán Winterscale en Quetza Temer y tráigalo de vuelta al Voto del Emperador. Juro por el Trono Dorado que lo convenceré de que se una a usted en cualquier conflicto que tenga en los próximos cien años. Después de todo, tengo la autoridad para hacer tratos en nombre del Lord Capitán mientras él siga ausente».
languages.original_text: "A generous favour in return for a generous favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Emperor's Vow. I swear by the Golden Throne that I will convince him to side with you in any conflict that occurs in the next hundred years. After all, I am allowed to make deals on the Lord Captain's behalf while he remains unavailable."

traits.locale_text: «Un generoso favor a cambio de otro. Encuentre al Lord Capitán Winterscale en Quetza Temer y tráigalo de vuelta al Voto del Emperador. Juro por el Trono Dorado que lo convenceré de que se una a usted en cualquier conflicto que tenga en los próximos cien años. Después de todo, tengo la autoridad para hacer tratos en nombre del Lord Capitán mientras él siga ausente».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「寛大な恩には寛大な恩で報いよう。ケツァ・テメルでロード・キャプテンのウィンタースケールを見つけ出し、『皇帝の誓い』号に連れ戻そう。黄金の玉座にかけて、今後100年間、あらゆる紛争であなたの味方になるよう彼を説得する。結局のところ、ロード・キャプテンが不在の間、代わりに取引を行う権限は私にあるのだから」
languages.original_text: "A generous favour in return for a generous favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Emperor's Vow. I swear by the Golden Throne that I will convince him to side with you in any conflict that occurs in the next hundred years. After all, I am allowed to make deals on the Lord Captain's behalf while he remains unavailable."

traits.locale_text: 「寛大な恩には寛大な恩で報いよう。ケツァ・テメルでロード・キャプテンのウィンタースケールを見つけ出し、『皇帝の誓い』号に連れ戻そう。黄金の玉座にかけて、今後100年間、あらゆる紛争であなたの味方になるよう彼を説得する。結局のところ、ロード・キャプテンが不在の間、代わりに取引を行う権限は私にあるのだから」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Cömert bir iyilikle karşılık verilecek, cömert bir iyilikte bulunmanızı. Quetza Temer'de Lord Kaptan Winterscale'i bulup İmparator'un Andı'na getirmenizi istiyorum. Altın Taht şahidim olsun ki önümüzdeki asırda tarafı olacağınız her savaşta sizin saflarınıza katılması için kendisini ikna edeceğim. Lord Kaptan namüsaitken onun adına anlaşma yapma yetkim var."
languages.original_text: "A generous favour in return for a generous favour. Find Lord Captain Winterscale on Quetza Temer and bring him back to the Emperor's Vow. I swear by the Golden Throne that I will convince him to side with you in any conflict that occurs in the next hundred years. After all, I am allowed to make deals on the Lord Captain's behalf while he remains unavailable."
